Name: Artillery Cats
About the game: Artillery Cats is a 2-8 player party battle game based off the old classic 'Bomberman'. Battle it out with your friends using unique cats with their own special abilities (More cats to come) on 4 different styles of maps each having a 4 or 8 player version. Each of the maps features its own unique mechanics that directly interacts with the way the players will have to fight whether in the form of an added threat or somehow changing how bombs work. - 4 unique and adorable cats to choose from! (4 more cats available in DLC and more cats to be added to the DLC over time) - 4 different maps styles to choose from ranging from forests to litter boxes! - A four player and eight player version of every map style! - More maps to be released later also for free!
